name: GetAllLandingPages
description:
Retrieve all landing pages from Mailchimp.

Use this tool to obtain a comprehensive list of all landing pages available in your Mailchimp account. Useful for marketing analysis and content management.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Specifies the order direction for sorting the results (e.g., ascending or descending).

value_schema.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.

parameters.name: sort_by_field
parameters.description: Specify the field by which the landing pages should be sorted.

value_schema.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

parameters.name: include_fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response, using dot notation for nested fields.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields_list
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: record_count
parameters.description: Specify the number of landing page records to return. Defaults to 10; maximum is 1000.

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: sort_dir
parameters.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.

value_schema.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.

parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

value_schema.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

value_schema.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
